name: Spacelyng
description:
This game is about the journey of an astronaut named Tom trying to get back home to his daughter.

The player has to control the space vessel through an alien planetary system. If they find themselves in a tight spot, they can activate a special power that accelerates time so that planes orbit faster, making the way quicker and easier. However, the time passes faster on earth and Tom's daughter gets older and older.

Game Created for Global Game Jam 2019 in collaboration with Alan Marques and Marco Akira.
